C

check3NF(Set<Attribute>, Set<FuncDep>) - Static method in class normalization.Algos
Check if a relation is in the third normal form (3NF)
checkBCNF(Set<Attribute>, Set<FuncDep>) - Static method in class normalization.Algos
Check if a relation is in Boyce-Codd normal form (BCNF)
checkLossyDecomposition(Set<Attribute>, Set<FuncDep>, Set<Set<Attribute>>) - Static method in class normalization.Algos
Check if a certain decomposition of a relation will cause FD loss
closure(Set<Attribute>, Set<FuncDep>) - Static method in class normalization.Algos
Compute the closure of a set of attributes under a set of FD's
combineRight(Set<FuncDep>) - Static method in class normalization.Algos
In-place combine the right side of the FD's that have the same left side
